column4: I see lots of people asking about wireless not working...what's up with that?  I'm here for that too.  I just installed Hardy on my Acer 5920 laptop, and I can't get wireless to work either.  It has the Intel 3945 chip...any ideas?  It dosen't even show up under Networking, and I get no wireless icon on the top task bar...
do lspci, put the return in pastebin, and ask again
Okay, my pastebin is at http://www.pastebin.com/d26317a5d
